dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To address this gap, in 2009 the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) developed the Social Institutions and Gender Index with data for some 180 countries. ...governments can assess how inclusive their gender policies are, identify areas for reform, and evaluate the programs they implement.
